flex-row-layout.label: Flex Row
flex-row-layout.archetype: <gc-widget-container layout horizontal style="width: 200px; height: 100px; border: 1px solid #ccc;"></gc-widget-container>

flex-col-layout.label: Flex Column
flex-col-layout.archetype: <gc-widget-container layout vertical style="width: 200px; height: 100px; border: 1px solid #ccc;"></gc-widget-container>
